title: "Quarto"

## Render & Review

1.  VSCode/RStudio -\> *Render* button
2.  Terminal -\> `quarto preview`
3.  Terminal -\> `quarto preview help`

## Render w/o Review

1.  Terminal -\> `quarto render`
2.  Terminal -\> `quarto render help`
